itemLabel: David Verney, 21st Baron Willoughby de Broke

wikipedia_page.main: Leopold David Verney, 21st Baron Willoughby de Broke,  (born 14 September 1938) is a British hereditary peer and member of the House of Lords.

response: *Leopold David Verney, 21st Baron Willoughby de Broke (b. 1938)
:29 Leopold David Verney, 21st Baron Willoughby de Broke (b. 1938), son.

This barony is therefore also dormant, although the heir is, like the other barony of 1299, also the present Baron Willoughby de Broke. If David Verney, 21st Baron Willoughby de Broke claimed this title, he would be 28th Baron Latimer, but have somewhat higher precedence.Complete Peerage, Vol VII, p. 465
